summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2134 for the improvement of a main trunk sewer or drainage district, to be known as the "King Street Trunk Sewer District," by the construction within said district of a main trunk sewer along certain described routes, in accordance with certain maps, plans and specification therefor, under Ordinance No. 21471, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
